          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réfraction de la lumière dans l'eau</string>
            <string language="en">Light refraction in water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Brechung im Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction claro na água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifrazione chiara in acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά διάθλαση στο ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción ligera en agua</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre la courbe de la  lumière dans l'eau selon l'angle du rayon d'incidence de la lumière.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows bending of light in water depending on the angle of incident light ray.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">courbe</string>
            <string language="en">bending</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Verbiegen des Lichtes 
im Wasser abhängig von dem Winkel des hellen Strahls des Ereignisses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a dobra da luz na água 
dependendo do ângulo do raio claro do incident.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la piegatura della 
luce in acqua secondo l'angolo del raggio luminoso di avvenimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κάμψη του φωτός στο ύδωρ
ανάλογα με τη γωνία της συναφούς ελαφριάς ακτίνας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la flexión de la luz en
agua dependiendo del ángulo del rayo ligero del incidente.</string>
          </description>
